main.name: Mary Kang
main.intro: I am a full stack software developer currently seeking new job opportunities.
main.bio: My name is Mary Kang. I recently took an exciting pivot in my career and I am looking for my first Web Developer job. My professional background in Supply Chain and Information Systems serves as the foundation for my business acumen, project management skills, and cross-functional collaboration strengths. When I'm not sitting in front of a computer, I love being outdoors - usually to hike, camp, take photographs, or play disc golf! I am a dedicated yogi, and my practice has equipped me to embody the mindset of a life-long learner - both in yoga and in coding.

education.description: Successfully completed full-time Software Engineering immersive. Technical skills include: Object-Oriented Programming, Ruby, ActiveRecord, Sinatra, Ruby on Rails, Javascript, React, Redux, JWT, HTML/CSS
Bachelor's Degree from the Smeal Business School in Supply Chain & Information Systems, with Minors in Information Systems Management and International Business.
